description: Made by Hama, assisted by Ranthalos and Meteor w/ technical stuff
name: Part 3: Basic PvE Weapon rolls to look for

data.description: Ritual Weapon from Lost, good option for casual content, but not ideal for DPS scenarios.
data.name: Ascendancy

data.description: Solid Rapid Fire Fusion if you want a Reservoir Burst option.
data.name: Null Composure

data.description: Amazing GL from Chosen. Special GL's with Chain Reaction is pretty rare and being paired with Ambitious Assassin makes this pretty much as good of a roll you can ask for. You also have the option of Vorpal and Demo which makes this already overloaded gun even more versatile.
data.name: Salvager's Salvo

data.description: Shadow Price has a couple solid perk options. Personally I prefer One For All, but Swash is also okay. Feeding Frenzy is your go to in the 3rd column, but Overflow / Surplus are also good options. Arrowhead / Fluted for Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Shadow Price

data.description: For Arc Logic I think you're either opting into Adren Junkie for damage, while Demo is for Nade builds. You'd want to pair Adren Junkie or Demo with Feeding Frenzy, Subsistence or Overflow. Frenzy is an option if with Subsistence or Overflow. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Arc Logic

data.description: Very fun Sword to run around with in PvE, Tireless and Assassin's Blade allows you to just run from ad to ad mowing them down. Relentless Strikes is also fine if you're planning on hitting the same target more than once. One For All is okay, but I personally prefer Assassin's. Jagged Edge is what you want here. Recommended MW: Impact. (Guaranteed)
data.name: Quickfang

data.description: Kill Clip and Swash are your primary dmg options for Tigerspite. You can choose to pair this with either Subsistence, Surplus or Overflow. My recommended Barrels are Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags you can go High Cal / Light Mag. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Tigerspite

data.description: While lacking the traditional best Scout perks, Pleiades is still serviceable with Multikill Clip for dmg & Demo for Nade builds. You'll want to pair this with Outlaw, Surplus or Subsistence in that order of preference. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Armor Piercing is nice for Match Game content, otherwise High Cal is best for Mags. Recommended MW: Stability.
data.name: Pleiades Corrector

data.description: Interesting Bow with Adagio as best dmg option. You can also opt into something like Dragonfly if you want or Demo for Nade builds. Archer's Tempo is the main go to in the 3rd column. Elastic String is your best String, but Polymer is also fine. Fiberglass / Straight Fletching for Arrows. Shoot to Loot is a nice perk that can work well if you're good at utilizing it. Recommended MW: Draw Time.
data.name: Wolftone Draw

data.description: You're mainly just using this for Eager Edge. Also a pretty rare drop.
data.name: The Other Half

data.description: You're mainly just using this for Eager Edge.
data.name: Half-Truths

data.description: Rapid Hit is an amazing perk on Scouts and you can easily combine this with One For All. Kill Clip is a fine second option for damage and you can opt into Disruption Break for Match Game content if you have a specific plan for it. Personally I think the ideal Scope is Flash HS5 / Candle PS, but this ends up being heavily preference in the end. High Cal / Flared are my preferred Mags, but Armor Piercing is solid for Match Game content or Barrier Champs. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Eternal Blazon

data.description: Very fun Sword that can roll Cold Steel. Though very niche in most content you can totally mess around with Stasis builds around this. You'd want to pair Cold Steel with Relentless Strikes ideally and Swordmaster's Guard, though Guard doesn't really matter as long as you avoid Heavy. Jagged Edge is best, but Honed / Tempered are your 2nd/3rd options here. Recommended MW: Impact. (Guaranteed)
data.name: Zephyr

data.description: Demo + Adren Junkie is probably the best combination for this gun if you're running Nade builds. I really want Blunt Execution Rounds to be good, but they're just not. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels here along with Accurized / Ricochet for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: BxR-55 Battler

data.description: Fortissimo is a pretty solid slug Shotgun, I'd personally like to run Perpetual Motion or Subsistence on it and pair it with damage options such as Vorpal or Frenzy. Demo + Adren Junkie is also a solid option for Nade builds. I also think Adagio has a place here, but some people may not like it. Arrowhead / Fluted are my preferred Barrels along with Assault / Appended for Mags. Recommended MW: Range / Handling.
data.name: Fortissimo-11

data.description: Ever since they nerfed Whirlwind Blade, Vorpal is now the preferred option here. You'll want Jagged Edge and Relentless Strikes to pair with it though.
data.name: Crown-Splitter

data.description: My go to here is Smallbore, Accurized and Short Action Stock as it gives a nice bump to Handling while also providing you 97 Range.
data.name: Osteo Striga

data.description: Frenzy on Tigerspite isn't the highest damage option, but it basically maxes out Handling & Reload. You'd want to pair Frenzy with Subsistence / Overflow. Ambitious Assassin Might be fun too. Arrowhead / Fluted would be my recommended Barrels and High Cal or Light Mag for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Tigerspite

data.description: Generally for Nade builds, Demo is an option for Tigerspite. I think there's better weapons suited for this, but if you like Tigerspite you can pair it with Subsistence, Surplus or Overflow. Arrowhead / Fluted are my preferred Barrels and High Cal / Light Mag for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Tigerspite

data.description: For Arc Logic I think you're either opting into Adren Junkie for damage, while Demo is for Nade builds. You'd want to pair Adren Junkie or Demo with Feeding Frenzy, Subsistence or Overflow. Frenzy is an option if with Subsistence / Overflow. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Arc Logic

data.description: For general usage Kill Clip is what you'd want here and ideally you'd pair it with Perpetual Motion, but Outlaw is also fine. Demo can work, but mostly you'd want that with Adren Junkie for Nade builds. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Accurized / Ricochet for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: BxR-55 Battler

data.description: Demo + Adren Junkie is a very potent perk combinations for Nade builds. Personally I don't spec into them too often, but this just ends up being a personal preference thing. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags, Assault / Appended. Recommended MW: Range / Handling.
data.name: Fortissimo-11

data.description: Strong Slug shotgun for PvP as it can have some pretty solid rolls. Fluted / Hammerforged are your preferred Barrels and you'd want either Accurized or Assault Mag. Personally I'd go for Perpetual Motion here, but Surplus is also good. Opening Shot and Adagio are by far your best options in the 4th column. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Fortissimo-11

data.description: Rapid Hit is an amazing perk on Scouts and you can easily combine this with One For All. Kill Clip is a fine second option for damage and you can opt into Disruption Break for Match Game content if you have a specific plan for it. Personally I think the ideal Scope is Flash HS5 / Candle PS, but this ends up being heavily preference in the end. High Cal / Flared are my preferred Mags, but Armor Piercing is solid for Match Game content or Barrier Champs. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Eternal Blazon
